common.offline: You are offline. Check your internet connection.

landing.captureMoments: Capture your unforgettable moments as digital badges on the Polkadot network.

explanation.title: How Dotmemo Works
explanation.claimDescription: Receive a digital badge for attending or participating in special events, all securely stored on the Polkadot network.
explanation.createDescription: Organizers can create unique badges to distribute at their events, giving attendees a tangible way to commemorate their experiences.
explanation.shareDescription: Show off your achievements by sharing your badges on social media or displaying them in your digital wallet.

claim.enterCodeDescription: Enter the secret code to proceed
claim.checkEmail: Check your email for a verification link
claim.emailError: Failed to send email. Please try again.
claim.connectWalletToClaim: Connect your wallet to claim this MEMO
claim.claimFailed: Failed to claim MEMO, please contact support or try again later.
claim.wantToShare: Would you like to share it?
claim.tooLate: It's too late to claim this MEMO
claim.emailAlreadyClaimedMemo: This email has already claimed this MEMO

create.title: .create
create.existenceError: Checking for uniqueness failed. Please contact support or try again later.
create.alreadyExists: This code is already being used

memo.name: Name
memo.descriptionPlaceholder: Describe your MEMO. This description will be displayed for all MEMO users.
memo.websiteHint: Use this if your memo should be linked to external domain
memo.dateHint: This is the date range when the MEMO will be available for claiming.
memo.quantityHint: This is the total number of MEMO pieces that will be available for claiming.
memo.antiabuseHint: Enabling this allows one-time claim codes to be auto-generated to prevent abuse.
memo.antiabuseDescription: When enabled, single-use secret codes are auto-generated.
memo.secretHint: This is a secret code that will be used to claim the MEMO. It should be shared with the attendees.
memo.antiabuseActive: Claim codes will be generated after creation.

dialog.canceled: Transaction was canceled. Please try again.
dialog.rememberCode: I have written down the MEMO secret code and understand that it is required to claim my MEMO.
dialog.missingSecret: Missing MEMO secret. Please go back and set one.

success.title: Purchased
success.viewCodeHelper: Used to share the MEMO, canâ€™t be used to claim.
success.noCodes: No codes returned. Please refresh and try again.

alreadyClaimed.description: The provided NFT has already been used for a holder-based drop and cannot be used again.
alreadyClaimed.name: NFT Already Used

alreadyExists.description: An item with this ID already exists. Please choose a unique ID when minting.
alreadyExists.name: Item Already Exists

approvalExpired.description: The approval has expired and is no longer valid. Tip: Request a new approval from the item owner.
approvalExpired.name: Approval Expired

attributeNotFound.description: The requested attribute cannot be found.
attributeNotFound.name: Attribute Not Found

badWitness.description: The witness data should be provided.
badWitness.name: Witness Required

bidTooLow.description: Your bid is too low. Please increase your bid amount. Tip: Check the current highest bid and adjust your bid accordingly.
bidTooLow.name: Bid Too Low

collectionIdInUse.description: The chosen collection ID is already in use. Please select a different ID.
collectionIdInUse.name: Collection ID Taken

collectionNotEmpty.description: The collection must be empty to be destroyed. Please remove all items first.
collectionNotEmpty.name: Remove Items First

deadlineExpired.description: The deadline for this action has already passed.
deadlineExpired.name: Deadline Expired

inconsistentItemConfig.description: The item's configuration is inconsistent with the provided data.
inconsistentItemConfig.name: Inconsistent Item Config

incorrectData.description: The provided data needs to be corrected.
incorrectData.name: Incorrect Data

incorrectMetadata.description: The provided metadata may exceed the allowed length.
incorrectMetadata.name: Incorrect Metadata

itemLocked.description: This item is locked and cannot be transferred. Please contact the collection owner.
itemLocked.name: Item Locked

itemsNonTransferable.description: Items in this collection cannot be transferred. Please review the collection settings.
itemsNonTransferable.name: Items Not Transferable

lockedCollectionAttributes.description: The collection's attributes are locked and cannot be modified.
lockedCollectionAttributes.name: Locked Collection Attributes

lockedCollectionMetadata.description: The collection's metadata is locked and cannot be changed.
lockedCollectionMetadata.name: Locked Collection Metadata

lockedItemAttributes.description: The item's attributes are locked and cannot be modified.
lockedItemAttributes.name: Locked Item Attributes

lockedItemMetadata.description: The item's metadata is locked and cannot be changed.
lockedItemMetadata.name: Locked Item Metadata

maxAttributesLimitReached.description: The maximum number of attributes per call has been reached.
maxAttributesLimitReached.name: Max Attributes Limit Reached

maxSupplyLocked.description: The maximum supply for this collection is locked and cannot be changed.
maxSupplyLocked.name: Max Supply Locked

maxSupplyReached.description: This collection has reached its maximum supply. No more items can be minted.
maxSupplyReached.name: Collection Is Full

maxSupplyTooSmall.description: The provided maximum supply is less than the number of items in the collection. Tip: Increase the maximum supply or remove excess items from the collection.
maxSupplyTooSmall.name: Max Supply Too Small

metadataNotFound.description: This item has no metadata. Consider adding metadata to enhance its value.
metadataNotFound.name: Item Metadata Not Set

methodDisabled.description: This method is currently disabled by system settings.
methodDisabled.name: Method Disabled

mintEnded.description: The minting process has already concluded. No more items can be minted.
mintEnded.name: Mint Ended

mintNotStarted.description: The minting process hasn't begun yet. Please wait for the mint to start.
mintNotStarted.name: Mint Not Started

noConfig.description: The configuration for this collection or item is missing.
noConfig.name: No Config

noPermission.description: You don't have permission to perform this action. Please check your account settings.
noPermission.name: No Permission

notDelegate.description: The provided account is not a delegate. Please check the account details.
notDelegate.name: Not a Delegate

notForSale.description: This item is not available for purchase.

reachedApprovalLimit.name: Reached Approval Limit

rolesNotCleared.name: Roles Not Cleared

unaccepted.description: The collection owner has not accepted ownership.
unaccepted.name: Unaccepted

unapproved.description: No approval exists for this transfer. Tip: Ensure you have the necessary approvals before initiating a transfer.
unapproved.name: Unapproved

unknownCollection.description: The specified collection doesn't exist. Please verify the collection ID.
unknownCollection.name: Unknown Collection

unknownItem.description: The specified item does not exist. Please check the item ID.
unknownItem.name: Unknown Item

unknownSwap.description: The specified swap does not exist.
unknownSwap.name: Unknown Swap

witnessRequired.description: The witness data should be provided.

manage.title: Your MEMOs
manage.dropsError: There was an error loading drops. Please contact our support or try again later.

customize.title: Claim page image
customize.titleHint: This image will be shown on the claim page. After claiming, users will receive your memo NFT with its own unique image.
customize.customPreviewImageHint: Upload a different image for the claim page
customize.heading: Heading
customize.socialsHint: Links to socials are displayed under the subheading
customize.colorsHint: Choose color that match your brand
customize.headingTooLong: Heading must be 40 characters or less
customize.subheadingTooLong: Subheading must be 300 characters or less
customize.claimTextTooLong: Button text must be 40 characters or less
customize.validationRequired: Please fix validation errors before saving
customize.invalidTelegram: Telegram username must be 5-32 characters: letters, digits, or underscores
customize.invalidInstagram: Instagram username must be 1-30 characters: letters, digits, underscores, or periods
customize.invalidTwitter: Twitter/X username must be 4-15 characters: letters, digits, or underscores
customize.invalidHexColor: Please enter a valid hex color (e.g., #FF5500)

organizers.title: Organizers
organizers.description: Add people who can view analytics for this drop

rarity.title: Rarity Tiers
rarity.hint: Define rarity tiers to make your drop more exciting. Each claimed MEMO will be randomly assigned a tier based on the weights you set.
rarity.description: Configure how rare each tier of your MEMO will be.
rarity.locked: Rarity tiers are locked because claims have already been made for this MEMO.
rarity.enableHint: When enabled, each claimed MEMO will be assigned a rarity tier.
rarity.replaceImage: Click or drop to replace the tier image
rarity.errorUpload: Failed to upload tier images. Please try again.
rarity.errorMixedImages: Add images for all tiers or remove the partial uploads.
rarity.errorSum: Tier weights must sum to exactly 100%
rarity.errorSumFixed: Tier quantities must sum to exactly {total}
rarity.errorEmptyName: All tiers must have a name
rarity.errorTotalSupply: Total supply must be at least 1
rarity.costHint: This amount is required for on-chain attribute storage.
rarity.transactionError: Failed to execute transaction. Try again later or contact support.

location.title: Location Restriction
location.hint: Restrict claims to users connecting from a specific country. Uses IP-based detection.
location.description: Limit claims to a specific region
location.restrictedTo: Only users from {country} can claim this MEMO
location.globalAccessHint: No restriction selected. This drop can be claimed by anyone, anywhere.
